casebody.data:
IN RE R.S. S242387 Supreme Court of California July 26, 2017 Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, Chin, Corrigan, Liu and Cuéllar, JJ.

*670The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in In re Ricardo P., S230923 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512 (d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.

**572Kruger, J., was absent and did not participate.
